titleStmt.title: A discourse concerning the adoration of the host, as it is taught and practiced in the Church of Rome wherein an answer is given to T.G. on that subject, and to Monsieur Boileau's late book De adoratione eucharisti√¶, Paris 1685.
titleStmt.author: Payne, William, 1650-1696.
